ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wake Up Call
ygData.msgSnippet: Gotta have some utility songs, too... Atonal ... From: 	KAZ [mailto:kazvorpal@yahoo.com] Sent:	Wednesday, February 05, 2003 10:21 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Gotta have some utility songs, too...

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: KAZ [mailto:kazvorpal@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 05, 2003 10:21 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Wake Up Call

--- Christopher Sanders <christopher.sanders@...> wrote:
> Hiya! This list has been dead...DEAD!
>
> Anyone still bothering, and just forgot (like I did) that this list was
> around?

You know what really annoys me? From about twelve to about nineteen, the
songs we get are crap. I'm having trouble staying interested. I thought Bard
would be the best class to play, because you don't have to wait four to ten
levels for any new stuff, but get a song every level...but when the songs do
things like identify items and imbue a non-magical weapon (which none of us
have used since the first few levels) as a Magic one, it's a total waste.

=====
There are things in the Constitution that have been overtaken by events, by
time...Inappropriate, anachronistic, it isn't done anymore...
-- Chairman Henry Hyde, who doesn't believe the Constitution needs to be
followed or legally changed, just ignored.
